entry.value:
[{"id":"ITB-244","entityId":"2-5743","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"ITB"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"244"},{"name":"summary","value":"Api - przegląd/poprawki"},{"name":"description","value":"

  • Dashboard:

    • /api/v2/currency_pair
    • /api/v2/loyalty-points
    • /api/v2/news GET + usunięcie selfa

  • Odbiorcy:

    • /api/v2/recipients get
    • /api/v2/recipients/{id} get
    • /api/v2/recipients/{id} post
    • /api/v2/recipients/{id} delete
    • /api/v2/recipients/{id} put

  • Karty:

    • /api/v2/cards(/{id}) get
    • /api/v2/cards/{id} delete
    • /api/v2/cards/{id} get
    • /api/v2/cards/{id} put

  • Polecenia:

    • /api/v2/referrals get
    • /api/v2/referrals/reward put
    • /api/v2/referrals/share post

  • Powiadomienia:

    • /api/v2/notifications get
    • /api/v2/notifications delete
    • /api/v2/notifications/{id} delete + links/remove => links/delete

  • Profil:

    • /api/v2/profile get
    • /api/v2/profile put
    • /api/v2/profile/flags get
    • /api/v2/profile/flags put
    • /api/v2/profile/limits get
    • /api/v2/profile/password put
    • /api/v2/profile/password post
    • /api/v2/profile post
    • /api/v2/profile/preferences get
    • /api/v2/profile/preferences put
    • /api/v2/profile/preferences patch

  • Dokumenty

    • /api/v2/profile/documents get
    • /api/v2/profile/documents post

  • Przelewy

    • /transfers get
    • /transfers/{id} get
    • /transfers/{id} delete
    • /transfers/types get
    • /transfers/csv post
    • /transfers/csv/{id} get
    • /transfers/currencies get
    • /transfers/exchange_rate get
    • /transfers/exchange_rate/multiple get
    • /transfers/init get
    • /transfers/pdf get

  • Płatność kartą

    • /api/v2/transfers/{id}/card_payment/is_available get

  • Płatność PBL

    • /api/v2/transfers/{id}/pay_by_link get
    • /api/v2/pay_by_link/{orderId} get
    • /api/v2/transfers/{id}/pay_by_link/is_available get

  • Token:

    • /api/v2/token post
    • /api/v2/token delete
    • /api/v2/token put
    • /api/v2/token/sn post

  • Inne

    • /api/v2/bluemedia/account_availability

  • Nowe endpointy:

    • /transfers/{id}/payment-methods get
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1539249133302"},{"name":"updated","value":"1541158685167"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.krawczyk"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maciej Krawczyk"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"a.malek"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Arkadiusz Malek"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"ITB-247","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"NPK-835","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"NPK-836","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"NPK-837","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"NPK-838","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"NPK-839","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"ITB-264","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"},{"value":"ITB-265","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Critical"],"valueId":["Critical"],"color":{"bg":"#e30000","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.krawczyk","fullName":"Maciej Krawczyk"},{"value":"d.remiszewski","fullName":"Daniel Remiszewski"},{"value":"a.malek","fullName":"Arkadiusz Malek"}]},{"name":"Spent time","value":["1300"],"valueId":["2d5h40m"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"SPrint 27","id":"Production Scrum Board:SPrint 27"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"4-3239","author":"m.krawczyk","authorFullName":"Maciej Krawczyk","issueId":"ITB-244","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
  • /api/v2/bluemedia/account_availability nie musimy na razie robić bo jest używane tylko w pierwszym przelewie w panelu (kiedy kwoty ustalane są przed wyborem odbiorcy), czego w aplikacji nie będzie
  • płatności kartą mieliśmy chyba nie robić bo w aplikacji to będzie jakoś inaczej zrobione?
  • czy PBL też tak samo jak karty?
  • do metod płatności endpointy /is_available lecą do nowego endpointu /transfers/{id}/payment-methods wiec nie trzeba ich robic osobno
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1540997270114,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"API","cssClass":"c6"}]}, {"id":"NPK-840","entityId":"2-6039","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"NPK"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"840"},{"name":"summary","value":"pierwszy przelew Ukraina - nieprawidłowy widok sposobu odbioru"},{"name":"description","value":"

https://www2.staging.easysend.pl/

  • nowy klient
  • pierwszy przelew - na Ukrainę
  • sposób odbioru się wyświetla jak na screen poniżej "odbiór w punkcie"
  • po kliknięciu w "odbiór w punkcie" pojawia się prawidłowy widok

  • a powinno się wyświetlać :

  • do metod płatności
  • do superfastów
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1537447425968"},{"name":"updated","value":"1540798675900"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"j.gorska"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Joanna Górska"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"m.krawczyk"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Maciej Krawczyk"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"ITB-249","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"Priority","value":["Medium"],"valueId":["Medium"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["New"],"valueId":["New"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.krawczyk","fullName":"Maciej Krawczyk"}]},{"name":"Estimation","value":["780"],"valueId":["1d5h"],"color":null},{"name":"Release","value":["ESBO 4.10"],"valueId":["ESBO 4.10"],"color":null},{"name":"Estimation sprint","value":["780"],"valueId":["1d5h"],"color":null},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"SPrint 27","id":"Production Scrum Board:SPrint 27"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"4-3214","author":"m.krawczyk","authorFullName":"Maciej Krawczyk","issueId":"ITB-235","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Jeden z błędnych przypadków:
  • dla wybranego kierunku w matrycy jest wyłączony SF
  • dla SF w tym kierunku nie ma cennika
  • w api TransferTypesController leci 500 (FeeNotFoundException) dla typu SF
